ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The task is to rewrite the logic of displaying the additional message so that it is calculated on the model, not in the javascript. Thus, already at the model level, it will be decided which confirmation window to display on the page. In the event model, we can not track the negative decision for confirmation, which is now generated in the "confirm ()". It is necessary to use "asp-additional-confirm".
